experience.description: Facilitated weekly tutoring sessions for undergraduate students in Probability Theory and Linear Algebra. Assisted students in mastering complex statistical formulas and quantitative problem-solving techniques.

Managed the organizational budget and maintained accurate records of expenditures using Excel. Collaborated with board members to allocate funds for professional development workshops and networking events.
Cleaned and organized large datasets for academic research projects using R and Python. Performed basic descriptive statistical analysis to support senior researchers in data visualization.

metadata.experience_level: No prior experience in job field
